main.name: Andrea Boyd
main.bio: I am a life-long resident of the Nashville area. The bulk of my adult employment has been focused in accounting and bookkeeping. While pursuing a bachelors degree in accounting, I also perused my way through some actuarial science course, which ultimately led to me taking my first computer science course. I enjoyed the exposure to Python and computer science in that class far more than I ever expected to, and while I did not finish the pursuit of a degree, I had always wanted to return to coding when life afforded me the opportunity to do so. I completed a certificate program in full-stack web development through Vanderbilt University in January 2021, and I am eager to continue my learning of the field. I hope to be employed in some capoacity in the world of web development in the future.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: If I have learned one thing about myself as an adult, it is that I am resourceful. I will try all avenues to clear the hurdles my work and personal lives has to offer, but I also know when to ask for help if all my personal resources have been fruitless in overcoming the challenges.

education.description: Completed general education courses as well as base accounting classes
